name: Road Z Survival: The Last Winter
description: Nuclear fallouts have settled, and the long, dark winter has begun! Wild ride through the world of nuclear fallouts, cold death, zombies, and postapo—Åalypse. Survival craft in a zombie game like never before - master both the craft of survival and extreme DRIVING across frozen lands.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800/ATI Radeon HD 2600 (256MB minimum) Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3/Vista/Windows 7 Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Quad Core Processor Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX460/ATI Radeon HD 5850 (512MB minimum) Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
